comment:
Toffee and citrus on the nose. 

Smooth, sweet, and buttery flavors. 

Some orange and raisins at the finish. 

No peat or smoke flavors at all. 

Outstanding whiskey. I will save the rest of this for special occasions only!!

I own this bottle. Bought it on my last day in Ireland after traveling in Europe for seven months. I loved the glass I had and one day, some day, will open the bottle I brought home with me if I deem the personal achievement worthy.
Amazing whiskey. Very smooth with sherry finish.
